front.title: Internet Open Trading Protocol (IOTP) HTTP Supplement

abstract.t: Internet Open Trading Protocol (IOTP) messages will be carried asExtensible Markup Language (XML) documents. As such, the goal ofmapping to the transport layer is to ensure that the underlying XMLdocuments are carried successfully between the various parties. Thisdocument describes that mapping for the Hyper Text Transport Protocol(HTTP), Versions 1.0 and 1.1, and the location of HTTP based IOTPservices using the SRV domain name system resource record.
